verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Now <S%H6258><s%> you shall see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> for under compulsion <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3027><s%> he shall let <S%H7971><s%> them go, <S%H7971><s%> and under compulsion <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3027><s%> he shall drive <S%H1644><s%> them out of his land. <S%H776><s%>"
God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> further to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am the Lord; <S%H3068><s%>

and I appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> as God <S%H410><s%> Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> but [by] My name, <S%H8034><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I did not make <S%H3045><s%> Myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them.

"And I also <S%H1571><s%> established <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, to give <S%H5414><s%> them the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> they sojourned. <S%H1481><s%>

"And furthermore <S%H1571><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the groaning <S%H5009><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are holding <S%H5647><s%> them in bondage; <S%H5647><s%> and I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> My covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

"Say, <S%H559><s%> therefore, <S%H3651><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from under <S%H8478><s%> the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> you from their bondage. <S%H5656><s%> I will also redeem <S%H1350><s%> you with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> and with great <S%H1419><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>

'Then I will take <S%H3947><s%> you for My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be your God; <S%H430><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from under <S%H8478><s%> the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

'And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to you [for] a possession; <S%H4181><s%> I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> on account <S%H4480><s%> of [their] despondency <S%H7115><s%> <S%H7307><s%> and cruel <S%H7186><s%> bondage. <S%H5656><s%>
Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Go, <S%H935><s%> tell <S%H1696><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to me; how <S%H349><s%> then will Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, for I am unskilled <S%H6189><s%> in speech <S%H8193><s%>?"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and gave <S%H6680><s%> them a charge <S%H6680><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Israel's first-born: Hanoch <S%H2585><s%> and Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi; <S%H3756><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> Jemuel <S%H3223><s%> and Jamin <S%H3226><s%> and Ohad <S%H161><s%> and Jachin <S%H3199><s%> and Zohar <S%H6714><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> woman; <S%H3669><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations: <S%H8435><s%> Gershon <S%H1648><s%> and Kohath <S%H6955><s%> and Merari; <S%H4847><s%> and the length <S%H8141><s%> of Levi's life <S%H9132><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty-seven years. <S%H8141><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon: <S%H1648><s%> Libni <S%H3845><s%> and Shimei, <S%H8096><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath: <S%H6955><s%> Amram <S%H6019><s%> and Izhar <S%H3324><s%> and Hebron <S%H9116><s%> and Uzziel; <S%H5816><s%> and the length <S%H8141><s%> of Kohath's life <S%H9132><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty-three years. <S%H8141><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari: <S%H4847><s%> Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi. <S%H4187><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their generations. <S%H8435><s%>

And Amram <S%H6019><s%> married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H802><s%> his father's sister <S%H1733><s%> Jochebed, <S%H3115><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and the length <S%H8141><s%> of Amram's life <S%H9132><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty-seven years. <S%H8141><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar: <S%H3324><s%> Korah <S%H7141><s%> and Nepheg <S%H5298><s%> and Zichri. <S%H2147><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel: <S%H5816><s%> Mishael <S%H4332><s%> and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%> and Sithri. <S%H5644><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H802><s%> Elisheba, <S%H472><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nahshon, <S%H5177><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah: <S%H7141><s%> Assir <S%H617><s%> and Elkanah <S%H511><s%> and Abiasaph; <S%H23><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Korahites. <S%H7145><s%>

And Aaron's son <S%H1121><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H802><s%> one <S%H4480><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Putiel, <S%H6317><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Phinehas. <S%H6372><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

It was [the same] Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Bring <S%H3318><s%> out the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to their hosts. <S%H6635><s%>"

They were the ones who spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> about bringing <S%H3318><s%> out the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> it was [the same] Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>
Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the day <S%H3117><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I am the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> to you."

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am unskilled <S%H6189><s%> in speech; <S%H8193><s%> how <S%H349><s%> then will Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me?"
